choices: Bowser is pleased and gives you an important role
You brought in a gift to ensure he'll approve of you
1131.content:
Despite being raised by the Mushroom Kingdom, you hated everything about it. It's army was incompetent and Bowser's army were far superior, which is sad since they countlessly lost to two Italian plumbers. However, it fitted their princess who did little more than put on a deceptively kind and powerful face. It was hard to believe that she was strong considering the woman couldn't last a month without being kidnapped and it was hard to believe her kindness after not giving a proper gift of money or much else to her Italian heroes at any of the times they saved her. She was absolutely useless and therefore crime was not uncommon in the Kingdom despite its sweet look.

Bowser may be stubborn, spoilt and childish, but he knew his goals. He was strict and harsh to his people, making sure to keep them all in line with fear, but at the same time ensuring that they still feel loyalty to him. His army always beat the Princess', they just needed training in how to take down the two plumbers and anyone else that could thwart the King's plans. The King's love for the Princess who refuses to call herself the queen was odd considering they have never had a proper conversation before, but if it gives him more reason to invade then it shouldn't cause too much harm to his rule.
You were certain he was the better leader, and while everyone may not approve at first, that can be changed in time. This was the reason you were roaming around his kingdom, you were going to help him gain that position by exposing any secrets the mushroom Kingdom has that could be of valuable to him, and you were going to enjoy Peach's downfall as she is enslaved by Bowser. It would be revenge for how you suffered under her rule.



As you wandered the lands of the Koopa King you began to think twice about the choices you have made. The scorching hot air and over all atmosphere made you fearful, but it was too late to turn back now.
"Halt!" A Paratrooper shouted in your direction, and swiftly made his way to you "What is your business in the our majesty's lands? You gulped, nervously but quickly responded.
"I wish to speak to the King of Koopas! I have important information on the Mushroom Kingdom to give!". After explaining in futher detail why you were here, you were guided to the castle and into the Bowser's throne room. He was a large and intimidating figure for sure, but you tried your hardest to not seem scared in any way at all. You did stutter slightly, but you showed professionalism. You didn't bore him much with why you changed into wanting him to rule. Instead you told him anything that he may be interested to know about the Castle structure and other things of importance. You had a surprising amount to talk about since you were once a guard for some time so you could gain money to help keep you alive as well as the people helping you. You don't know if it was luck or skill, but you rose through the ranks faster than others and you learned many secret routes and such that many people didn't know about.
Things that they would regret telling you.

By the time you stopped talking, Bowser looked intrigues. He looked slightly bored as if he had a small attention span, but that couldn't be helped since you were saying everything that came to your mind and thus you were talking for a long time, but you tried to keep him engaged by taking some questions from him now and then.
You waited for his reply. If he was the king you were hoping he'd be, he'll give you a job in his army, or at least somewhere to stay.

You revealed the egg behind you. "To celebrate my assistance to you, I brought you a gift," you say confidently. Bowser raises an eyebrow then orders his nearest troops to take it.

Bowser looked at the big egg curiously. "What's in it?" he demanded.

"Princess Peach," you reply quickly. Bowser's eyes widened in disbelief. He quickly orders his guards to bring the gift close to him and open the egg. 132.content:
One day you were walking through a forest, it looked so similar to the one in the movie The Jungle Book. That's the only reason you liked walking through this forest. Just passing the time, by looking at the flowers that bloomed, and hearing the natural noises. Until you heard a song a few feet away "Look for the Bear neccesities, the simple bear necessities." 'That's impossible, the song could be sung by anyone, but with that voice! It can't be.'

Traveling ahead to find the source of the song, you soon come across to a large bush. Moving some leaves aside, your guess was correct, only making you wonder how it could be. In front of you, lying on the ground and eating honey, is Baloo himself. From head to toe, he looked 10'4" tall, covered in dark grey fur, with light grey on his big bulging belly. Claws sharp and a freindly attitude in his song.

"Looking for the bare necessities
The simple bare necessities
Forget about your worries and your strife
I mean the bare necessities
That's why a bear can rest at ease
With just the bare necessities of life" Baloo continued to sing and you can only stare at his big gut. You once dreamt of being eaten by the bear and knew it to be impossible. But perhaps now, it is, as long as the bear is willing and doesn't tear you apart.

"Wherever I wander, whenever I roam
I couldn't be fonder of my big home
The bees are buzzin' in the trees
To make some honey just for me-" You had startes to sit down and listen to him finish his song, when your knee snapped a twig. Baloo stopped and snapped his head in your direction "Who's there? Come out, I won't hurt you." He said, gathering your courage you stepped out in clear view, to the bear. Baloo got up on his hind legs and wobbled over to you. "A man! Well what are you doing out here?"

"I'm sorry to startle you, I was just walking through the forest and heard singing. Thought I'd check it out." Tou respond, before Baloo can speak again his stomach let out a loud, but quick rumble. Baloo looked away blushing "Sorry about that." "Oh its no problem, how much food do you put in there?" You ask, "As much as I can really, but sometimes it just gets really hard and I don't know what to do. I need food before I starve"

This is your chance, "If I may, I have an idea of how to fill your big belly." Baloo drops into a sitting position with a loud *THUD*, "Go ahead, I'm all ears." He said with a salivating grin on his face. "Well, how about you eat me. Think about it, I'm big, I can fill your big 'ol belly, and rub your belly from the inside." Baloo looks at you curiously, "Why do you want me to eat you?" You respond "I've always had a dream of being swallowed whole by a bear. I never thought it would be possible, until now. Are you hungry?" Baloo responds...
132.title: I will likely fill that big gut

1321.content:
"You know what I am! But if I'm gonna eat you, you need to take off all of that cloth." Baloo said. You begin to strip excitedly that your dream is about to come true. And in 60 seconds, are standing in front of the big bear naked. Baloo leans down and sniffs your body, taking in your scent "You smell good, say what's your name. I want to know my new friend's name, before you become my meal. I'm Baloo." "My name's Axel, a pleasure to meet you Baloo. Enjoy your meal."

Baloo walks behind you and you can fell his tongue licking your back, to get a taste. *Moan* goes the bear and so you stand there waiting until he eats you. Eventually he grasps your sides and lifts you. You look up to see his maw is opened wide. The sharp bear fangs that were in his gums. The tongue, covered in saliva and has your taste on it. Baloo shoves your head into his mouth. Then Baloo lifted his tongue once more, licking all over your face to get a good taste.

Baloo stretched his jaws slightly and gently pulled you further down into his mouth. You felt as the strong arms holding your waist pushed you further through the bear's open jaws. And you felt the large soft tongue push out toward your neck, then felt your head pulled toward the bear's throat. He pushed you down a bit further forcing your head into his throat.

Your chest was in the bear's mouth now, and Baloo ran his tongue all over it to get a good taste. Ready for more, Baloo repeatedly relaxed and tightened the grip of his jaws and continued pushing down with his arms on your waist to allow you to slide deeper down into his mouth. Finally, when his jaws were up to your waist, he let go, leaving you stuck halfway in his mouth. The bear's eyes were still closed, but he opened them now, and the sight of your legs sticking out of his mouth, was so comical that he nearly choked from laughter.

The last thing you had seen was the pulsing entrance to Baloo's throat sucking your1 head in, and you were then wrapped in darkness when Baloo's throat squeezed around your head. Your arms, pinned down by the bear's tongue, were useless -- even if you could grab onto something, everything was too soft and slick with bear saliva to keep a grip. But why would you want to. You were enjoying yourself.

You then felt Baloo's fangs poking into your butt as the bear gripped down with his jaws. Your shoulders were sucked down into Baloo's powerful throat muscles. Baloo, his mouth still full of boy, moaned happily as he continued slurping you down. He let you squirm your way down from the butt to the knees before noticing that his jaws were becoming sore and that his stomach was growling in anticipation of the approaching meal. While a bit reluctant to finish up his food so suddenly, he started gulping quickly now, his tongue sliding up and down over your legs to insure that he tasted every inch of flesh before it slid into his throat. Baloo watched as your feet sank down lower and lower, and finally out of the bear's sight and into his mouth. Baloo stuck out his tongue and playfully tickled your feet as they slipped between the bear-jaws. He felt you twitch with laughter, before finally closing his jaws around your wiggling feet. Baloo let your feet sink down into his throat (where the your wiggling toes tickled him!) then swallowed you down with a loud, powerful *GULP*. The bear strained to lower his head and saw a large bulge slipping down his chest. Baloo put his hands over his belly and felt as your head entered, the rest of your body following quickly. Baloo let out a chuckle as you filled up his stomach and gave the squirming bulge in his belly a firm but gentle rubbing. You were a tough kid, but Baloo was confident that his stomach would win out in the end.

You could barely bend your knees now, as they and the rest of your body above them were squeezed tightly within the walls of Baloo's throat. You experienced a few seconds of relief when you felt your
feet tickled by the bear's tongue. The moment of laughter gave you some more joy. Your head soon poking through into the stomach. You squirmed about playfully as your shoulders, then your waist, your legs, and finally your feet slid through the esophagus and into the tight confines of Baloo's belly. You lay there, saying out loud, and hoping he could hear "Thank you Baloo, your the best." You heard him say "Aaahhh, your welcome Axel, you tasted delicious. And you really did fill my big 'ol belly. You felt a tingling sensation, almost burning, all over your skin. You knew this would happen and made it more pleasurable for Baloo. You kicked and squirmed as much as you could, but the tight walls of the stomach prevented almost any movement. Quickly worn down from exhaustion and beginning to lose consciousness, you lay still as the contracting and churning of Baloo's stomach massaged you into relaxation. Within minutes you were sleeping peacefully inside the bear's belly, neither noticing nor caring about the digestive enzymes that poured over your body and started dissolving your flesh . . .

Baloo lay down on the ground, looked down at his bulging stomach and gave it a few pats, seeing and feeling your last struggles. The movement in his belly slowed down, then stopped, and the bear let out a contented sigh, followed by a loud burp. Baloo could hardly believe that he'd really eaten a human and the young man he'd barely known and suggested Baloo to eat him. A friend who was now peacefully digesting in his stomach. But feeling a sudden spasm of movement from his belly and noticing the distinct aftertaste of man in his belch reminded the bear of where his friend was.

Baloo saw the pile of clothes his friend wore. And was a but sad he didn't talk with him first. Reminding himself that Axel's flavor had been quite a treat. The warm feeling in his belly made everything seem worthwhile. After taking one last look at the man- sized bulge in his abdomen, Baloo tilted his head back and closed his eyes for a nap. Before drifting off completely, the gurgling sounds from within assured him that Axel was settling down nicely within his new home, ready to provide excellent nourishment. For the first time, the two friends napped together in a sleeping arrangement that Axel had never imagined and that Baloo had only dreamed of before.

Baloo yawned and stretched lazily, then looked down at his abdomen. He saw that he'd digested most of Axel during his nap -- the bulge had shrunk so much that it was hardly noticeable now. He left the clothes there, deciding that he needed no physical "momentos" of his friend -- his memories were enough. As he considered this, he rubbed his belly and chuckled, "Yep, I'll remember you every time I fill up my stomach!", then he bounded off into the wilderness. Looking for another human to devour.

The open fields provide easy pickins for a predator of his stature. Soaring into the sky, he glides above the luscious plains, on the alert for an easy meal. He passes by plenty of Pidgeys and other common types, but he's not in the mood for a chase.

1411211.content:
The big dragon circles down steadily. His paws tap against the thick bed of grass, silencing any unintended warnings. He creeps up slowly to the clearing, observing the pack from a distance. There's four Pikachus in all, and a plump Raichu he wasn't able to see from the sky. He sucks in his big belly to prevent it from rumbling -- This is a much better jackpot than usual.

The Pikachus are arguing hotly with the Raichu. Perfect, they're all occupied. Gauging the distance between himself and one of the Pikachus, he narrows his eyes and grins maliciously. Craning his long neck, he opens his wide mouth, leaning slowly towards the clueless electric mouse. With a quick snapping motion, he bites down on the Pikachu's head, engulfing half the poor prey's body.

With a squeal, the Pikachu is lifted easily into the air. The other 'Chus turn to look as one of their numbers struggle vainly inside the mouth of an evidently hungry dragon. One of the other Pikachus leaps forward and grabs his friend's feet. He too is swung up, his body weight a small detail for a ravenous Charizard's might.

The big Fire-type opens his maw as wide as necessary. Without even gulping, the meal slides down easily into his throat. The other Pikachu's counter weight proves a small hindrance, so the Charizard swallows mightly, pulling the first mouse entirely into his throat and the other one's head inside. A large bulge is visible on the outside of the hungry beast's long neck, terrifying the spectators. He lifts his head completely vertically, and the two Pikachus slide easily down his throat. The dual bulges sink rapidly toward his stomach as he snaps his jaws shut. The two Pikachus land with a thump inside the big dragon's bottomless gut.

1452122112.content: Thankfully, the Lugia seems to not wish you harm. Using its psychic powers, the Lugia begins telepathically speaking to you: "Hello, little human. I am Lugia, Guardian of the Seas. You may be wondering why you are here, before me. You see, I found you nearly drowned in the ocean, so I brought you here... But, there is also another reason."
1452122112.title: It's friendly.

14521221121.content: "This is not our first meeting, you see. When you were a small child, about the age of six, you found me as an abandoned egg. Obviously, I am not the first Lugia to exist; I come from a long family history of my species. When you discovered my egg, you decided to protect me. I know that it was you, as I was able to use my cognitive abilities to witness the world around me before I was born. Thanks to your kindness, I am forever in your debt. I want you to become my trainer, so that I may serve you as you please. I do not need to protect the seas, as I have a brother who is still performing that task. Would you like me to become your Pokemon?"

14521221121121.content:
"Are you hungry, Lugia?" you ask, for some strange reason.

"Why, yes, I am rather famished," complains Lugia, "Why, do you have food?"

"Well... This is going to sound strange," you say, "but I was hoping that you could swallow me whole." Lugia looked puzzled. "You see, I've always wanted to be eaten alive and experience what it is like, and now that you are standing in front of me, I figured that you are of a great enough size to accomplish the task."

"I could definitely swallow you if you really wanted me to," replies Lugia, "In fact, I'd enjoy it. But do you really want to die, here and now?"

"Is there a way you could eat me without killing me?" you ask.

"If you wish, I could disable my digestive system when I swallow you, and you will not be harmed," answers Lugia.

"That sounds great!" you exclaim. "Thank you so much!"

"No," says Lugia, "thank you, master."

145212211211211.content:
Lugia lowers his head to the ground. Now that you were face to face, on eye level with this enormous creature, you could really appreciate its true size. It's eye is almost as big as your entire body!

Before Lugia allows you to enter its mouth, it asks you if you could take your clothes off, as to not damage his digestive system. You reluctantly accept, and you take off all of your clothes. As Lugia's beak began to open, your heart started racing with excitement. You, lucky you, are going to be eaten whole by this wonderful creature! You're going to be sliding down its slick throat! Lugia invites you to enter its mouth.

Your feet sink into Lugia's tongue as you step on it, causing you to laugh with excitement. Lugia seems to enjoy your taste, as its tongue begins to wiggle. As the tongue brushes against you, it feels amazingly soft on your skin. Lugia's mouth is extremely moist, and you are already covered in saliva. As you look around the cavernous mouth, you notice that Lugia's teeth are bigger than your entire body. The mere thought of being chewed by this beast sends shivers down your spine. Next, you turn your attention to Lugia's cheeks. The cheek's flesh is really slippery to the touch. As you look to Lugia's throat, you notice how its uvula wobbles around. When you think about how you are going to be travelling down that long, dark tunnel makes your heart beat. The mouth smells very humid, and is similar to a human's, except for the pointed teeth.

As you lie down on Lugia's tongue, enjoying the sensation of being where you are right now, Lugia showers you in its saliva as it tastes you. The saliva being poured onto your skin feels surprisingly wonderful; it's almost as if you're being bathed. Lugia starts to become more aggressive while tasting you, now flailing its tongue around. Lugia really seems to enjoy your taste (maybe you should try this again sometime)!

Soon, Lugia can't seem to stand having not swallowed you yet, and asks, "Are you ready to be swallowed?"
145212211211211.title: Lugia allows you to enter his mouth.

1452122112112111.content:
At your answer, Lugia almost immediately pushes you into its throat using its tongue. You fall into the throat feet-first, and the squishy and sticky throat muscles immediately constrict around your legs and begin dragging you down. You felt powerless, and you truly were: Lugia has you completely at your mercy! The muscles in Lugia's throat are way too strong for you to be able to fight against! No matter what you do, you are headed to Lugia's stomach; when you realize this, it makes you wonder if Lugia was telling the truth when he said that "[he] could shut off [his] digestive system"... Maybe you're going to end up as Lugia's food! at this point, you didn't really mind... You even relish the thought of becoming nutrition for this mighty beast's muscular, sleek body. You could really tell how powerful this beast is as you are being pushed down the esophagus. The muscles are extremely aggressive in pushing you towards the stomach. Strangely, enough, the sensation of the squishy muscles constricting your body isn't actually painful; it's almost like a soothing massage.

Soon enough, you reach the esophageal sphincter, and are pushed through into Lugia's stomach.
1452122112112111.title: "Ready as ever!"

After falling for a few seconds, you land with a splash in Lugia's stomach acids, which immediately begin to melt your skin. You knew it! Lugia lied about shutting off his digestive system!

"I'm sorry, human," says Lugia, "but I am a living creature... I must eat. I have to say, though, that you were probably the most delicious meal I have ever eaten..." The words honour you, despite what they mean. You don't mind being digested. Once the searing pain ends, you will become nothing more than sustenance for this beautiful creature, and you couldn't really ask for much better than that!

"I enjoyed becoming your meal," you reply. As you look Lugia's stomach, you notice that it's really wrinkly and constantly gurgling, trying to process its meal (you). As you begin to drift off into an everlasting sleep, you start rubbing the slimy walls of Lugia's stomach, helping it digest you.
